timeline.bodyText: Do we want to add the other write options in this PR or keep the refactor separate?

replies.bodyText: @rdblue @karuppayya, shall we add SparkReadOptions and move all read and write options to those classes? I think we need a place for them. It would be great to build a utility class that would take into account table properties, SQL conf, write/read options and provide the actual value to be used in the future. That being said, I think we should start simple and SparkReadOptions and SparkWriteOptions sounds reasonable to me.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

timeline.bodyText: Nit: can you revert the whitespace change?
